comment.author: 39628197@N08
comment._content: This drives me wild! I see a tortoise in its shell, rivers, valleys, desert, skin of a creature that must be magic, antediluvian times long forgotten; this is raw, wild, smooth rough and infinitely polished all at once. Hell of a thing! In a word, WOW... Good going!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Glad you liked it. The flight from Cairo to Luxor is always magical, especially in the late afternoon when the landscape glows. ~Mary
